curam.util.workflow.impl
Class WorkflowAuditAdmin

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.impl.WorkflowAuditAdmin

public final class WorkflowAuditAdmin
extends java.lang.Object

WorkflowAuditAdmin is an API for examining the workflow data object attribute values associated with the audit information for a workflow process instance.

The value of workflow data object attributes are logged as they are used throughout the process instance lifecycle. The routines in this API query the values of workflow data object attributes at required execution periods in the process instance.

Workflow data object attribute values are logged when they are used:

  • before the execution of an activity
  • after the execution of an activity
  • during transition resolution

    Method Detail

    getWDOValuesHistory

    public static WDOValuesAuditHistory getWDOValuesHistory(long activityInstanceID,
                                                        java.lang.String executionPeriod)
                                                 throws AppException,
                                                        InformationalException
    Returns the workflow data object audit history for a specific activity instance over a required execution period. The execution period indicates when, during workflow execution, the audit information was logged.

    Parameters:
    activityInstanceID - the activity instance identifier.
    executionPeriod - the execution period.
    Returns:
    wdoValuesAuditHistory the audit history entry details, or throws an AppException if it's not found.
    Throws:
    AppException - ID_AUDIT_WDO_VALUES_NOT_FOUND There are no audit values for this activity instance identifier and this execution period.
    InformationalException - typical informational exceptions.

    searchWDOValuesHistoryByActivityInstance

    public static WDOValuesAuditHistoryList searchWDOValuesHistoryByActivityInstance(long activityInstanceID)
                                                                          throws AppException,
                                                                                 InformationalException
    Returns the workflow data object audit history logged for the specified activity instance.

    Parameters:
    activityInstanceID - the activity instance identifier.
    Returns:
    a list of workflow data object attribute values logged for the specified activity instance.
    Throws:
    InformationalException - the informational activity.
    AppException - typical application exceptions.

    searchWDOValuesHistoryByProcessInstance

    public static WDOValuesAuditHistoryList searchWDOValuesHistoryByProcessInstance(long processInstanceID)
                                                                         throws AppException,
                                                                                InformationalException
    Returns the workflow data object audit history logged for the specified process instance.

    Parameters:
    processInstanceID - the process instance identifier.
    Returns:
    a list of workflow data object attribute values logged for the specified process instance.
    Throws:
    AppException - typical application exceptions.
    InformationalException - typical informational exceptions.

    searchWDOValuesHistoryByProcessInstanceAndDate

    public static WDOValuesAuditHistoryList searchWDOValuesHistoryByProcessInstanceAndDate(long processInstanceID,
                                                                                       DateTime fromDateAndTime,
                                                                                       DateTime toDateAndTime)
                                                                                throws AppException,
                                                                                       InformationalException
    Returns the workflow data object history audit information for the specified process instance within the specified time period.

    Parameters:
    processInstanceID - the process instance identifier.
    fromDateAndTime - the date and time after which the workflow data object history details were audited.
    toDateAndTime - the date and time before which the workflow data object history details were audited.
    Returns:
    the workflow data object audit history that was written for the specified process instance between the two specified dates - on or after the fromDateAndTime date and before the toDateAndTime date.
    Throws:
    InformationalException - the informational activity.
    AppException - typical application exception.
